[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [Icon](./blockly.icon_class.md) &gt; [getCorrectedSize](./blockly.icon_class.getcorrectedsize_1_method.md)

## Icon.getCorrectedSize() method

Get the size of the icon as used for rendering. This differs from the actual size of the icon, because it bulges slightly out of its row rather than increasing the height of its row.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getCorrectedSize(): Size;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[Size](./blockly.utils_namespace.size_class.md)

Height and width.
